Title: Queen Elizabeth II: Consider Moody Blues Members for Knighthood
Overview:
Madam Queen;

The music of Mike Pinder; Ray Thomas; Graeme Edge John Lodge and Justin Hayward for 50 years has touched and changed the lives of countless persons. The Moody Blues and performances to date show no signs in slowing down.  This band is the forerunner for Progressive Rock Music and the many things they did in the music industry were 'firsts'.  This petition deserves support from the bands many fans because we'd like to see them receive the recognition they very much deserve.  Mike Pinder and Ray Thomas deserve recognition even though in the current line-up they are not included.  The band with these members in it laid the groundwork for the band as it stands now.
Letter Body: Consider Moody Blues Members (Justin Hayward; John Lodge; Graeme Edge; Ray Thomas and Mike Pinder) for Knighthood
